channel.title: Server help
channel.description:
i made a private server using whitescape the ip is theunis.no-ip-org but for some reason my friends cant connect to it while its running even when firewalls are off it only lets me on for some reason and i added there charicter to the files so they log in but it tells the error connecting to server i think its because im on a router also when i spawn a monster and clikc on it to attack it the server freezes upif some one can maybe make a tut on how to add some npc and monsters yo tour server and a tut on how to make it so your routr doesnt block them from connecting
can i get some help plz

item.title: Server help
item.dc:creator: @The_Unis The Unis
item.description:
@The_Unis wrote:

1.well i changed the health of the npc so i can attack it but it still freezes and it sasy in the ms-dos window that it timed out could it be because im spawning him in the middle of the game while im playing or do i have to add the npc i want to the autospawn.cfg?

2.when i add a npc to the autospawn.cfg does that mean that when i start the game up the npc or monster will spawn automatiicly everytime in the coordinates i out in?

3.if i have to do in what i put in #2^ will the monster respawn after a while or do i have to set that to?

4.my frineds files are in lowercase and its one word could it be the fact that im behind a router?[br][size=1]Posted at: April 21, 2006, 12:29:35 pm[/size][hr]BUMP~

Read full topic

item.title: Server help
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

the monster problem is because the hp for the monster is set to 0 change it to a number as for the connecting problem make sure you have no CAPS in the file name and the user name password ect

Read full topic
